name: doubtingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an uncertain way that shows feelings of doubt: She looked at him doubtingly as he explained what had happened. Someone opened the door and he went in doubtingly. Synonym
doubtfullyRelated word
doubt
More examplesFewer examplesShe held the map out to him and he took it doubtingly.I thought I heard a noise and listened doubtingly for a moment or two.He looked at her doubtingly, as if he needed her approval.The child tasted the soup doubtingly.He expressed his opinion doubtingly to the judge.
